dcterms:description: A dataset containing episodes of two objects moving in a grid environment, bouncing along the walls without colliding with each other. The goal is to model the bouncing dynamics and predict the actual position and velocity of every object in a future frame.
dcterms:title: 2-BouncingShapes (2-BS)

dcterms:description: A dataset containing episodes of three objects moving in a grid environment, bouncing along the walls without colliding with each other. The goal is to model the bouncing dynamics and predict the actual position and velocity of every object in a future frame.
dcterms:title: 3-BouncingShapes (3-BS)

dcterms:description: A dataset containing episodes of three objects moving in a grid environment, allowed to collide with each other. The goal is to model the collision dynamics and predict the actual position and velocity of every object in a future frame.
dcterms:title: 3-Bouncing Shapes with Collision (3-BSC)

dcterms:creator: T. Kipf
E. van der Pol
M. Welling
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of three balls moving in an environment under the effect of gravity and colliding with each other. The motion dynamics are not provided to the model.
dcterms:title: 3-body Physics (3-BP)
